name: Stormbot-tcl-xivserver-module
tagline: Poll the Lodestone for the current server status
body:
Final Fantasy XIV Server Status for Stormbot 6 - TCL ===================================================== Developer: Dustin Lennon
Email: Install Instructions -------------------- Just place this module in your botdir/scripts/beads directory and then run BOT maint load xivstatus to load the module. Refer to the help file in the module for usage instructions: BOT XIVSTATUS help If you experience any issues please submit a bug report on . You can always get the latest source from as well. Changelog - Dates are in Epoch time ----------------------------------- 1377224028: * Created a README for GitHub and brought this repository online.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
